title: Unlock level 40 emote, it's not on my emote page. Get an S rank, no mastery 7 token.
body:
For some reason things aren't unlocking on my account today. I unlocked the level 40 emote for 10 BE today, since they reducded the prices and it's not on my emotes page in game. I also just played an ARAM game where I got a S rank as Katarina (I'm mastery 6 Kat) and didn't get a level 7 token for her.

Any help would be appreciated.

Update: My emote showed up ehen I logged in later on in the day. The mastery 7 token is still missing.

replies.body:
Glad to hear you finally found that Emote! 

You didn't get a mastery token for Kat because you got the S on ARAM. Be sure to read over how you can get those tokens right over [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284).

https://i.gyazo.com/c71e959e64050132d6c15decda106912.png
I got 2 emotes from hextech craft, 1 blitz and one which i don't remember what was. None of theese have showed up in my emote inventory , nor in the loot ...
